# Non-Negotiables

The following behaviors are not allowed:

- Skipping PRD creation for feature work
- Implementing behavior not defined in the PRD
- Treating AI output as approval
- Bypassing QA for risky changes
- Hiding or ignoring known risks
- Claiming “Copilot said it was fine”

If a non-negotiable is violated:

- Call it out explicitly
- Do NOT proceed silently
